sentences.english: Grapes on the south slopes, olives on the north.
sentences.chinese: 南坡上种着葡萄，北坡是种橄榄。

sentences.english: Relatively, the factors of summer habitat selection in south slope are more than North slope.
sentences.chinese: 相比而言，秦岭南坡夏季栖居地选择因素多于北坡。

sentences.english: The provenance of delta is the eastern and south slope of the sag.
sentences.chinese: 三角洲的物源主要来自洼陷的东部和南坡。

sentences.english: A canyon on the southern slope is evidence of a collapse in the volcano’s past.
sentences.chinese: 南坡上的峡谷就是它过去塌陷的见证。

sentences.english: Lava flow on the south flank of South Sister.
sentences.chinese: 三姐妹山南峰南坡上的熔岩流。

sentences.english: Comparing to Everest, Shishapangma is a much less climbed mountain and the south face is even less so.
sentences.chinese: 相比于珠峰，爬希夏邦马的就少多了，特别是南坡。

sentences.english: Trophic niche of flea in the southern slope of the Himalaya Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 喜马拉雅山南坡蚤类营养生态位的研究。

sentences.english: South of the mountains, extends slowly to the Indian Ocean.
sentences.chinese: 山脉的南坡缓缓的伸向印度洋。

definition: halfway up a mountain/lit. waist of mountain
northern mountain/refers to Mt Mang 邙山 at Luoyang in Henan
